levelw = 20 levelh = 13

draw_floor("fl-gradient", {1,1}, {1,0}, 11, {type=FLAT_FORCE_E}) draw_floor("fl-gradient", {1,11}, {1,0}, 11, {type=FLAT_FORCE_E}) set_floor("fl-gradient", 12,1, {type=SLOPE_S_FORCE_E}) set_floor("fl-gradient", 12,11, {type=SLOPE_N_FORCE_E})
